name: 專題討論（四）
description: 本課程定期邀請國內外地球科學領域之學者專家進行專題演講，包含地質、地球物理、海洋、大氣與太空等次領域，介紹其近期研究內容與結果，並進行學術討論。
goals: 透過當代不同領域學者之講演使學生學習本系各相關學術領域的最新進展，並從而規劃相關研究題材。
syllabus:
The class schedule is with the 16+2 flexible weeks format

Flexible weeks remarks: Additional assignment for seminar participation, notes, reports, and additional discussion after the class are considered as extra hours for the course learning process. That will take up the class hours for 2 weeks.

The seminar series consists of two parts (10 week and 6 weeks with adjustments depending on scheduling):

(1) Listening to the research reports by invited seminar speakers provides the opportunities for student to learn the newest research progresses in different fields of Earth Sciences and the reseach tools needed for their studies.  

(2) Students present their thesis research progress during the seminar time.

methodologies.note: The schedule of invited talk can be found on the departmental website after school starts

grading.note: according to the departmental marking scheme
